# drp-grid-gallery-select-image



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                 | Attribute                 | Description                                    | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------------ | ------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `height`                 | `height`                  | Height of the container surrounding the image  | `string` | `undefined` |
| `imageSrc`               | `image-src`               | Source of the image                            | `string` | `undefined` |
| `thumbnailSrc`           | `thumbnail-src`           | Source of the thumbnail image                  | `string` | `undefined` |
| `transitionMilliseconds` | `transition-milliseconds` | Transition time between image load and display | `number` | `500`       |
| `width`                  | `width`                   | Width of the container surrounding the image   | `string` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event                             | Description                | Type                                 |
| --------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| `drp-grid-gallery-image-selected` | When the image is selected | `CustomEvent<{ imageSrc: string; }>` |
